bibl.title: Augustine and Manichaeism in Light of the Cologne Mani Codex.
bibl.note: I. The Importance of Augustine's Manichaean Period for his Discovery of the Greek Concept of Free Will. - II. Mani's Relationship to Christianity and Gnosticism.
